channel.title: Drop Dupe fix how?
channel.description:
Hello,
I found a drop dupe on DELTA, and how can i fix it?
Please, help me this is the easiest dupe i ever saw lol.
Thanks, I D D S I

put a timer on the npc drops bub.

item.title: Drop Dupe fix how?
item.dc:creator: @reverce reverce
item.description:
@reverce wrote:

work on this

public void pvpdrop(String name, int pid) { if (combatLevel < 50 || getClient(pid).combatLevel < 50) { return; } lastKilled = name; if (lastKilled.equalsIgnoreCase(pvp1) || lastKilled.equalsIgnoreCase(pvp2) || lastKilled.equalsIgnoreCase(pvp3) || lastKilled.equalsIgnoreCase(pvp4)) { sM("You have recently killed "+lastKilled+", so you won't get a pvp drop."); return; } int random = misc.random(7); int randomz = misc.random(140); switch (random)
experment with codes , use pvp drop rewards( use jinrake’s playerkilling method)
put a timer on npc drops that they don’t appear for other players thats all u have to do.

Read full topic

item.title: Drop Dupe fix how?
item.dc:creator: @I_D_D_S_I I D D S I
item.description:
@I_D_D_S_I wrote:

[quote=“reverce, post:2, topic:304102”]simples way yust make that if they drop its direclty dissapear in ground its so easy i tel you how. open your client class
just look for this code

if (playerRights == 2) { sM( "You drop the " + getItemName(droppedItem) + ", it vanishes into the ground."); deleteItem(droppedItem, slot, playerItemsN[slot]); return ; }
and right underit yust past this code

if (playerRights == 0) { sM( "You drop the " + getItemName(droppedItem) + ", it vanishes into the ground."); deleteItem(droppedItem, slot, playerItemsN[slot]); return ; } so if playerrights are 0 (= normal players) the item you drop will vanish.
gl[/quote]

Yep, that what i already got.

But if you got a good NPC drop, u can dupe it.
You can kill other people in wilderniss, u can dupe it.

So it still aint finished ;(

Read full topic

item.title: Drop Dupe fix how?
item.dc:creator: @reverce reverce
item.description:
@reverce wrote:

simples way yust make that if they drop its direclty dissapear in ground its so easy i tel you how. open your client class
just look for this code

if (playerRights == 2) { sM( "You drop the " + getItemName(droppedItem) + ", it vanishes into the ground."); deleteItem(droppedItem, slot, playerItemsN[slot]); return ; }
and right underit yust past this code

if (playerRights == 0) { sM( "You drop the " + getItemName(droppedItem) + ", it vanishes into the ground."); deleteItem(droppedItem, slot, playerItemsN[slot]); return ; } so if playerrights are 0 (= normal players) the item you drop will vanish.
gl
